question: Are both <Chuhuoluo> and <Shenzhenyi> humans or animals? A. Humans. B. Animals.
What are the genders of <Chuhuoluo> and <Shenzhenyi> respectively? A. Girl, Boy. B. Boy, Girl.
What are the hair colors of <Chuhuoluo> and <Shenzhenyi> respectively? A. Brown, Blue. B. Blue, Brown.
What type of clothing do <Chuhuoluo> and <Shenzhenyi> often wear? A. Traditional, Modern. B. Both Traditional.
Do <Chuhuoluo> and <Shenzhenyi> have long hair? A. Yes. B. No.
